headline: Comcast Names Nick Kask Vice President of Finance and Business Operations for Big South Region
summary: Comcast today announced that Nick Kask has been named Vice President of Finance and Business Operations for the company's Big South Region. In this role, Kask will oversee financial planning, project execution, customer experience, and operational strategy to support Comcast's continued expansion and performance across the region.
